sentences.sContent: Diving off the cliffs is dangerous.
sentences.sCn: 从悬崖上跳水是很危险的。

sentences.sContent: The first time you dive on a coral reef is an experience you will never forget.
sentences.sCn: 第一次在珊瑚礁潜水是毕生难忘的经历。

sentences.sContent: The aircraft appeared to dive vertically towards the crowd.
sentences.sCn: 飞机似乎垂直朝着人群俯冲下来。

synos.tran: [水运]潜水；跳水；[航]俯冲；急剧下降

phrases.pCn: v. 投入；把手伸入；钻研
开始大吃；头朝下跳入水中
◎突然下降，急剧下降，(行市等)暴跌
头部朝下的俯冲；（价格等的）暴跌；一落千丈

remMethod.val: 我第一次跳水(dive)， 给(give)我点儿勇气

words.tran: 潜水者；跳水的选手；潜鸟

trans.tranOther: to jump into deep water with your head and arms going in first
